Package it.polimi.ingsw.network.Client

Class SocketClient

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.observer.Observable
it.polimi.ingsw.network.Client.SocketClient
All Implemented Interfaces:
Client
public class SocketClient
extends Observable
implements Client
This class represents a socket client implementation.

  • Constructor Details

    • SocketClient

      public SocketClient​(java.lang.String address, int port) throws java.io.IOException
      Default constructor
      Parameters:
      address - IP address of the server. The method assumes the string is already correctly formatted.
      port - Server port.
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - Thrown if I/O streams cannot be opened.

  • Method Details

    • readMessage

      public void readMessage()
      Reads a message from the server via socket and notifies the ViewController.

    • sendMessage

      public void sendMessage​(Message message)
      Sends a message to the server via socket.
      Specified by:
      sendMessage in interface Client
      Parameters:
      message - The message to send

    • disconnect

      public void disconnect()
      Disconnect the socket from the server.

    • enablePinger

      public void enablePinger​(boolean enabled)
      Enable a heartbeat (ping messages) between client and server sockets to keep the connection alive.
      Parameters:
      enabled - set this argument to true to enable the heartbeat. set to false to kill the heartbeat.
